Contact Us

If you would like to contact us about any Cuba-related solidarity activity, please send us an email at sydneyacfs@gmail.com.

If you would like to donate, please use Electronic Funds Transfer to:
Bank: Commonwealth Bank
BSB: 062-003
Account Number: 00801160
Account Name: ACFS Sydney
Please give a reference so we know what you would like your donation to be used for.

If you would like to join our mailing list to receive news on Cuba solidarity in the Sydney area, please use the form below to sign up!

If you live outside of NSW and would like to find out more about your local Cuba friendship society, please follow these links:

Brisbane ACFS: www.acfs-brisbane.org.au

Canberra ACFS: acfscanberra-amigosdecubacanberra.blogspot.com.au

Perth ACFS: acfs-perth.blogspot.com.au

New Zealand Friendship Society: cubasolidarity.blogspot.com.au
